executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus ONLY on the following:
1. Access the Home page BEFORE logging in to verify it works offline/for visitors.
2. Perform the COMPLETE buyer workflow while LOGGED IN:
   - Login
   - Find a product
   - Open chat with seller
   - Negotiate/Receive an offer (simulate)
   - Complete the purchase
   - Verify order status and OTP delivery logic.
Ensure the test covers both public (Home) and private (Buyer dashboard/Chat/Orders) areas.
